DIDWidth_Ft.description: Drive-in door width in feet. Typically 12

DIDHeight_Ft.description: Drive-in door height in feet. Typically 14

DIDDepth_Ft.description: Drive-in door depth in feet. Typically -1

NorthWallDriveInsPerDockRun.description: Number of drive-ins per dock run on the North wall

SouthWallDriveInsPerDockRun.description: Number of drive-ins per dock run on the South wall
